basics.name: Chaitra R Bhat
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: I'm a frontend developer with hands-on experience in backend technologies, allowing me to create comprehensive web solutions using the latest tools and techniques.
basics.objective: Motivated to broaden my skill set with external training, with a focus on elevating major front desk performance indicators. Ready to utilize my organizational strengths to implement time-saving solutions for executives at a dynamic firm.

work.name: Mphasis Software and Services Pvt Ltd
highlights: * Worked on a team of 5 developers to develop a web application for a client
work.summary:
• Extensive experience in crafting UI web applications using a diverse tech stack including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, React JS, Angular, Bootstrap, Typescript, and more.
  • Proficient in consuming REST APIs in both services and components, leveraging dependency injection, and conducting API testing using Postman.
  • Extensive expertise and proficiency in developing intricate single-page applications using React, Angular frameworks, Redux, Axios, webpack, mat UI, Git, Jira, etc.
  • Collaborated seamlessly with web designers, backend developers, and UX designers across all stages of product development, from design and coding to testing and enhancement
  • Skillfully construct React and Angular modules, services, and routing components, demonstrating proficiency in developing feature-rich grid systems with sorting, pagination, and filtering functionalities.
  • Collaborate closely with UX designers, Product Owners, Scrum Masters, and Team Leads to provide valuable insights and ensure a seamless translation of design concepts into functional, user-friendly features.
  • Ensure the scalability of the UI by optimizing loading speed and performance, contributing to an enhanced user experience.
  • Keep Project Managers and IT Leads informed about the overall progress of projects and teams, fostering effective communication and collaboration.
  • Demonstrate the ability to work within tight deadlines, effectively prioritize tasks, and execute them with precision.
  • Thoroughly trained and certified in the ADM FSE domain, blending theoretical knowledge with practical expertise.
